articles.description: The 28-year-old apologised for referring to Johnny Depp as his 'hero', and has removed all traces of a selfie with the actor which he had shared to Instagram on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Sam Fender has apologised for referring to Johnny Depp as his 'hero', and has deleted a selfie with the actor which he had shared to Instagram on Wednesday.
The singer, 28, had been enjoying a pint … [+5789 chars]
